extendedInfo.description: The Global Phone Tracker is a tool that allows you to track the location of another Android or iPhone user.  Now you can follow the movements of a friend, your spouse, your child, or a co-worker with you Android.ââââââââââââââââââTrack one other Android or iPhone for FREE!ââââââââââââââââââThe Global Phone Tracker combines the robust GPS functionality of the Android, internet mapping and the latest features of the Android platform. Features include:âº Locate another person and view his/her movements during the previous 4 hours.âº Permission based system allows/denies other users to follow you.âº GPS options to reduce battery usage.âº Simple registration process.âº Follow both iPhones and Android phones.Uses include:âº Follow your child's movements during the day.âº Know where a family member is at any time.âº Track an employee's travel route.âº Locate friends.âº Find lost or stolen phones.Other items:âº This version allows you to track 1 person and see his/her movements for 4 hours. âº Upgrade allows you to follow up to 10 people and see their movements for 48 hours.âº To follow another person, they must use the "Phone Tracker" to grant you permission.âº Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.âº IF YOU HAVE ANY PROBLEMS, EMAIL US AT: HELP@PhoneTracker.us.com
